section.title: Web User Interface - WebUI
section.para: WebUI is the name of GateIn's own webframework. GateIn Portal is built with it and also many applications available in the GateIn platform suites. Using its own framework means that the way the portal is build will not interfere with any web technology used by the portlet deployed. Using a particular technology would have make it more difficult for a user to use a different version (newer or older) of the same technology. If one choose to create WebUI portlets, here is some documentation. In general we recommend to use JSF as the framework of choice to develop new portlets.
The WebUI framework is a component tree based framework. The key aspects of WebUI are :

listitem.para: : GateIn portlets are built with WebUI
: GateIn portal itself is a WebUI application
How-to: : Learn how to write your own app with WebUI
